89  class Interactor

91  public:

94  Interactor() : _top(NULL), _em(NULL) {};

96 
97  // UNITS IN INPUT FILES
98  // ... Always use atomic units
99  // ... ... Positions in a0 (bohr)
100  // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(a0)**k
101  // ... ... Dipole polarizability in A³ (Angstrom cubed)
102 
103  // UNITS USED INTERNALLY
104  // ... Use nm instead of a0 and A
105  // ... ... Positions in nm
106  // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(nm)**k
107  // ... ... Dipole polarizability in nm³
108 
109  // CONVERSION FACTORS
110  // ... Electric field (N/C) = Electric field (int)
111  // * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+18
112  // ... Energy (eV) = Energy (int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+09
113  //
114  // ... Potential (V) = Potential(int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+0.9
115 
116

288  inline double T21s_20() { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*ray*raz - 5*ray*raz + 10*rbz*ray*czz + 10*rbz*raz*cyz + 2*cyz*czz); }

290  inline double T22s_20() { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*ray - 5*rax*ray + 10*rbz*rax*cyz + 10*rbz*ray*cxz + 2*cxz*cyz); }
291  inline double T21s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*ray*raz + 5*rbx*ray*czz + 5*rbx*raz*cyz + 5*rbz*ray*czx + 5*rbz*raz*cyx + cyx*czz + czx*cyz); }
292  inline double T22c_21c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbx*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cxz - 10*rbx*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxx - 10*rbz*ray*cyx + 2*cxx*cxz - 2*cyx*cyz); }
293  inline double T22s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rbx*rax*cyz + 5*rbx*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyx + 5*rbz*ray*cxx + cxx*cyz + cyx*cxz); }
294  inline double T22c_21s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rby*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rby*rax*cxz - 10*rby*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxy - 10*rbz*ray*cyy + 2*cxy*cxz - 2*cyy*cyz); }
295  inline double T22s_21s() { return R5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rby*rax*cyz + 5*rby*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyy + 5*rbz*ray*cxy + cxy*cyz + cyy*cxz); }
296  inline double T22s_22c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbx*rax*ray - 35*rby*rby*rax*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cyx + 10*rbx*ray*cxx - 10*rby*rax*cyy - 10*rby*ray*cxy + 2*cxx*cyx - 2*cxy*cyy); }
297 
298  Topology *_top;
299  EMultipole *_em;
300 
301  };
302 
303

428 void EMultipole::Initialize(Property *opt) {
429 
430  // update options with the VOTCASHARE defaults
431  UpdateWithDefaults( opt );
432 
433  cout << endl << "... ... Initialize with " << _nThreads << " threads.";
434  _maverick = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
435 
436  cout << endl << "... ... Parameterizing Thole model";
437 
438  string key;
439  string xmlfile;
440 
441  /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure ----
442  * <emultipole>
443  *
444  * <multipoles></multipoles>
445  *
446  * <control>
447  * <induce></induce>
448  * <first></first>
449  * <last></last>
450  * <output></output>
451  * <check></check>
452  * </control>
453  *
454  * <esp>
455  * <calcESP></calcESP>
456  * <doSystem></doSystem>
457  * <cube></cube>
458  * <output></output>
459  * <esp>
460  *
461  * <esf>
462  * <calcESF></calcESF>
463  * <grid></grid>
464  * <output></output>
465  * <esf>
466  *
467  * <alphamol>
468  * <calcAlpha></calcAlpha>
469  * <doSystem></doSystem>
470  * <output></output>
471  * </alphamol>
472  *
473  * <tholeparam>
474  * <cutoff></cutoff>
475  * <cutoff2></cutoff2>
476  * <expdamp></expdamp>
477  * <scaling></scaling>
478  * </tholeparam>
479  *
480  * <convparam>
481  * <wSOR_N></wSOR_N>
482  * <wSOR_C></wSOR_C>
483  * <maxiter></maxiter>
484  * <tolerance></tolerance>
485  * <log></log>
486  * </convparam>
487  */
488 
489  key = "options.emultipole.multipoles";
490 
491  if ( opt->exists(key) ) {
492  xmlfile = opt->get(key).as< string >();
493  }
494 
495  key = "options.emultipole.control";
496 
497  if ( opt->exists(key+".induce") ) {
498  int induce = opt->get(key+".induce").as< int >();
499  _induce = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
500  }
501  else { _induce = true; }
502 
503  if ( opt->exists(key+".first") ) {
504  _firstSeg = opt->get(key+".first").as< int >();
505  }
506  else { _firstSeg = 1; }
507 
508  if ( opt->exists(key+".last") ) {
509  _lastSeg = opt->get(key+".last").as< int >();
510  }
511  else { _lastSeg = -1; }
512 
513  if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
514  _outFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
515  _energies2File = true;
516  }
517  else { _energies2File = false; }
518 
519  if ( opt->exists(key+".check") ) {
520  _checkPolesPDB = opt->get(key+".check").as< string >();
521  }
522  else { _checkPolesPDB = ""; }
523 
524  key = "options.emultipole.esp";
525 
526  if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESP") ) {
527  int calcESP = opt->get(key+".calcESP").as< int >();
528  _calcESP = (calcESP == 0) ? false : true;
529  }
530  else {
531  _calcESP = false;
532  }
533  if (_calcESP) {
534  _espCubeFile = opt->get(key+".cube").as< string >();
535  _espOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
536  if (opt->exists(key+".doSystem")) {
537  int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
538  _ESPdoSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
539  }
540  else { _ESPdoSystem = false; }
541  }
542 
543  key = "options.emultipole.esf";
544 
545  if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESF") ) {
546  int calcESF = opt->get(key+".calcESF").as< int >();
547  _calcESF = (calcESF == 0) ? false : true;
548  }
549  else {
550  _calcESF = false;
551  }
552  if (_calcESF) {
553  _esfGridFile = opt->get(key+".grid").as< string >();
554  _esfOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
555  }
556 
557  key = "options.emultipole.alphamol";
558 
559  if ( opt->exists(key+".calcAlpha") ) {
560  int calcAlpha = opt->get(key+".calcAlpha").as< int >();
561  _calcAlphaMol = (calcAlpha == 0) ? false : true;
562  }
563  if ( opt->exists(key+".doSystem") ) {
564  int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
565  _doSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
566  }
567  else {
568  _doSystem = false;
569  }
570  if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
571  string alphaOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
572  _alphaOutFile = alphaOutFile;
573  }
574  else {
575  _alphaOutFile = "nofile";
576  }
577 
578  key = "options.emultipole.gsp";
579 
580  if ( opt->exists(key+".calcGSP") ) {
581  int calcGSP = opt->get(key+".calcGSP").as< int >();
582  _calcGSP = (calcGSP == 0) ? false : true;
583  }
584  else {
585  _calcGSP = false;
586  }
587  if ( opt->exists(key+".dma_input") ) {
588  int dma_input = opt->get(key+".dma_input").as< int >();
589  _dma_input = (dma_input == 0) ? false : true;
590  }
591  else {
592  _dma_input = false;
593  }
594  if ( opt->exists(key+".first") ) {
595  _gsp_first = opt->get(key+".first").as< int >();
596  }
597  else {
598  _gsp_first = _firstSeg;
599  }
600  if ( opt->exists(key+".last") ) {
601  _gsp_last = opt->get(key+".last").as< int >();
602  }
603  else {
604  _gsp_last = _lastSeg;
605  }
606  if ( opt->exists(key+".normal") ) {
607  _gsp_normal = opt->get(key+".normal").as< vec >();
608  }
609  else {
610  _gsp_normal = vec(0,0,1);
611  }
612 
613  key = "options.emultipole.tholeparam";
614 
615  if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff") ) {
616  _cutoff = opt->get(key+".cutoff").as< double >();
617  if (_cutoff) { _useCutoff = true; }
618  }
619  if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff2") ) {
620  _cutoff2 = opt->get(key+".cutoff2").as< double >();
621  }
622  else {
623  _cutoff2 = _cutoff;
624  }
625  if ( opt->exists(key+".expdamp") ) {
626  _aDamp = opt->get(key+".expdamp").as< double >();
627  if (_aDamp) { _useExp = true; }
628  }
629  if ( opt->exists(key+".scaling") ) {
630  _scale1 = opt->get(key+".scaling").as< vector<double> >();
631  if (0 < _scale1.size() && _scale1.size() < 4) {
632  _useScaling = true; }
633  else {
634  _useScaling = false;
635  cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: 1-N SCALING SWITCHED OFF"; }
636  }
637 
638  key = "options.emultipole.convparam";
639 
640  if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_N") ) {
641  _wSOR_N = opt->get(key+".wSOR_N").as< float >();
642  }
643  else { _wSOR_N = 0.75; }
644  if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_C") ) {
645  _wSOR_C = opt->get(key+".wSOR_C").as< float >();
646  }
647  else { _wSOR_C = 0.75; }
648 
649  if ( opt->exists(key+".maxiter") ) {
650  _maxIter = opt->get(key+".maxiter").as< int >();
651  }
652  else { _maxIter = 512; }
653 
654  if ( opt->exists(key+".tolerance") ) {
655  _epsTol = opt->get(key+".tolerance").as< double >();
656  }
657  else { _epsTol = 0.001; }
658 
659  this->EStatify(NULL, opt);
660 
661  if (_calcESP && (!_ESPdoSystem)) { this->CalculateESPInput(NULL); }
662  if (this->_calcESF) { this->CalculateESF(NULL); }
663  if (this->_calcAlphaMol) { this->CalculateAlphaInput(NULL); }
664  if (_calcGSP && _dma_input) { this->CalculateGSPInput(NULL); }
665 }
666 
667 
674 void EMultipole::EStatify(Topology *top, Property *options) {
675 
676  cout << endl << "... ... Estatify system: ";
677 
678  string key = "options.emultipole";
679  string allocFile = options->get(key+".multipoles").as<string> ();
680 
681  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
682  // Load polar-site indices from XML //
683  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
684 
685  // => Output to maps:
686  map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
687  map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
688  map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n;
689  map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e;
690  map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h;
691 
692  Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
693  load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
694 
695 
696  /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
697  *
698  * <topology>
699  *
700  * <molecules>
701  * <molecule>
702  * <name></name>
703  *
704  * <segments>
705  *
706  * <segment>
707  * <name>DCV</name>
708  *
709  * <multipoles_n></multipoles_n>
710  * <multipoles_e></multipoles_e>
711  * <multipoles_h></multipoles_h>
712  *
713  * <map2md></map2md>
714  *
715  * <fragments>
716  * <fragment>
717  * <name></name>
718  * <mpoles></mpoles>
719  * </fragment>
720  * </fragments>
721  * ...
722  * ...
723  */
724 
725 
726  key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
727  list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
728  list<Property *>::iterator molit;
729  for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
730 
731  string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
732 
733  key = "segments.segment";
734  list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
735  list<Property *>::iterator segit;
736 
737  for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
738 
739  string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
740 
741  // GDMA filenames for cation (h), neutral (n), anion (e) state
742  string mpoleFile_n = (*segit)->get("multipoles_n").as<string> ();
743  alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n[segName] = mpoleFile_n;
744  if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_e")) {
745  string mpoleFile_e = (*segit)->get("multipoles_e").as<string>();
746  alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e[segName] = mpoleFile_e;
747  }
748  if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_h")) {
749  string mpoleFile_h = (*segit)->get("multipoles_h").as<string>();
750  alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h[segName] = mpoleFile_h;
751  }
752 
753  // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
754  if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
755  int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
756  _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
757  }
758  else {
759  _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
760  }
761 
762  key = "fragments.fragment";
763  list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
764  list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
765 
766  for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
767 
768  string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
769  string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
770 
771  string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
772 
773  if (tools::globals::verbose) {
774  cout << endl << "Fragment " << fragName << flush;
775  cout << endl << "Polar sites " << mpoles << flush;
776  }
777 
778  Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
779  vector<string> mpoleInfo;
780  tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
781 
782  vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
783  vector<string> mpoleNames;
784 
785  vector<string> ::iterator strit;
786  for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
787 
788  Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
789  vector<string> poleInfo;
790  tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
791 
792  int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
793  string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
794 
795  if (tools::globals::verbose) {
796  cout << endl << "MP id=" << mpoleIdx << flush;
797  cout << ", MP name=" << mpoleName << flush;
798  }
799 
800  mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
801  mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
802 
803  }
804 
805  alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
806  alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
807  }
808  }
809  }
810 
811  // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
812  // Parse GDMA punch files //
813  // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
814 
815  // => Output to PolarSite Container (template container)
816  map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > map_seg_polarSites;
817  map<string, vector<bool> > map_seg_chrgStates;
818 
819 
820  // Multipoles for neutral state
821  int state = 0;
822  map<string, string > ::iterator strit;
823  for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.begin();
824  strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.end();
825  strit++) {
826 
827  string segName = strit->first;
828  string filename = strit->second;
829 
830  vector< PolarSite* > poles = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
831 
832  map_seg_polarSites[segName] = poles;
833  map_seg_chrgStates[segName].resize(3);
834  map_seg_chrgStates[segName][0] = false; // <- negative
835  map_seg_chrgStates[segName][1] = true; // <- neutral
836  map_seg_chrgStates[segName][2] = false; // <- positive
837  poles.clear();
838 
839  }
840 
841  // Multipoles for negative state
842  state = -1;
843  if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.size() ) {
844  for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.begin();
845  strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.end();
846  strit++) {
847  string segName = strit->first;
848  string filename = strit->second;
849 
850  vector< PolarSite* > polesAnion = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
851  map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
852 
853  // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
854  vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];
855 
856  assert(polesAnion.size() == polesNeutral.size());
857  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
858 
859  polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesAnion[i]->getQs(state), state );
860  polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesAnion[i]->getPs(state), state );
861  delete polesAnion[i];
862  }
863  polesAnion.clear();
864  }
865  }
866 
867  // Multipoles for positive state
868  state = +1;
869  if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.size() ) {
870  for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.begin();
871  strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.end();
872  strit++) {
873  string segName = strit->first;
874  string filename = strit->second;
875 
876  vector< PolarSite* > polesCation = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
877  map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
878 
879  // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
880  vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];
881 
882  assert(polesCation.size() == polesNeutral.size());
883  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
884 
885  polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesCation[i]->getQs(state), state );
886  polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesCation[i]->getPs(state), state );
887  delete polesCation[i];
888  }
889  polesCation.clear();
890  }
891  }
892 
893  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
894  // Forward information on polar-site templates to topology //
895  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
896 
897  // Containers to use for mapping
898  // map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > map_seg_polarSites;
899  // map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
900  // map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
901 
902  // TO CONTINUE FROM HERE ...
903  // Loop over segments, loop over fragments in segments.
904  // => For each segment, look up associated polar sites using map 1;
905  // => For each fragment, look up associated
906  // polar sites idcs. using map 2;
907  // => For each index in retrieved container, create new polar site,
908  // importing information from polar site container of segment
909  // => Translate positions to MD frame, copy local frame from
910  // fragment
911 
912  _map_seg_polarSites = map_seg_polarSites;
913  _map_seg_chrgStates = map_seg_chrgStates;
914  _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx = alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
915  _alloc_frag_mpoleName = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
916 
917 }
918 
919 
927 vector<PolarSite*> EMultipole::ParseGdmaFile(string filename, int state) {
928 
929  int poleCount = 1;
930  double Q0_total = 0.0;
931  string units = "";
932  bool useDefaultPs = true;
933  bool warn_anisotropy = false;
934 
935  vector<PolarSite*> poles;
936  PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
937 
938  vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
939  double P1; // <- dipole polarizability
940 
941  std::string line;
942  std::ifstream intt;
943  intt.open(filename.c_str());
944 
945  if (intt.is_open() ) {
946  while ( intt.good() ) {
947 
948  std::getline(intt, line);
949  vector<string> split;
950  Tokenizer toker(line, " \t");
951  toker.ToVector(split);
952 
953  if ( !split.size() ||
954  split[0] == "!" ||
955  split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
956 
957  // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
958  // ! DCV2T opt
959  // ! SP RB3LYP 6-311+G(d,p)
960  // Units bohr
961  //
962  // C -4.2414603400 -3.8124751600 0.0017575736 Rank 2
963  // -0.3853409355
964  // -0.0002321905 0.2401559510 0.6602334308
965  // -0.7220625314 0.0004894995 -0.0003833545 0.4526409813 -0.50937399
966  // P 1.75
967 
968 
969  // Units used
970  if ( split[0] == "Units") {
971  units = split[1];
972  if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
973  throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
974  + filename + " not supported.");
975  }
976  }
977 
978  // element, position, rank limit
979  else if ( split.size() == 6 && split[4] == "Rank" ) {
980 
981  Qs.clear();
982  P1 = -1.;
983 
984  int id = poleCount++; // <- starts from 1
985  string name = split[0];
986 
987  double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
988  double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
989  double x, y, z;
990 
991  if (units == "bohr") {
992  x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
993  y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
994  z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
995  }
996  else if (units == "angstrom") {
997  x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
998  y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
999  z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
1000  }
1001  else {
1002  throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
1003  + filename + " not supported.");
1004  }
1005 
1006  vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
1007 
1008  int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
1009 
1010  PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
1011  newPole->setRank(rank);
1012  newPole->setPos(pos);
1013  poles.push_back(newPole);
1014  thisPole = newPole;
1015 
1016  }
1017 
1018  // 'P', dipole polarizability
1019  else if ( split[0] == "P" && (split.size() == 2 || split.size() == 7) ) {
1020  if (split.size() == 7) {
1021  warn_anisotropy = true;
1022  }
1023  P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
1024  thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
1025  useDefaultPs = false;
1026  }
1027 
1028  // multipole line
1029  else {
1030 
1031  int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
1032 
1033  if (lineRank == 0) {
1034  Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
1035  }
1036 
1037  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
1038 
1039  double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
1040 
1041  // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
1042  double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
1043  qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
1044 
1045  Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
1046 
1047  }
1048  thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
1049  }
1050 
1051  } /* Exit loop over lines */
1052  }
1053  else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
1054 
1055  cout << endl << "... ... ... Reading " << filename <<
1056  ": Q0(Total) = " << Q0_total << flush;
1057 
1058  if (useDefaultPs) {
1059 
1060  cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
1061  << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
1062 
1063  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
1064  for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
1065  string elem = (*pol)->getName();
1066  double alpha = 0.0;
1067  // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
1068  if (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3; } // <- conversion from
1069  else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } // A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
1070  else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
1071  else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
1072  else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
1073  // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
1074  //if (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
1075  //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } // A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
1076  //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
1077  //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
1078  //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
1079  else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
1080  "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
1081  (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
1082  }
1083  }
1084 
1085  if (warn_anisotropy)
1086  cout << endl
1087  << "WARNING: '" << filename << "': EMultipole does not support "
1088  << "tensorial polarizabilities, use zmultipole instead."
1089  << flush;
1090 
1091  return poles;
1092 }
1093 
1094 
1099 vector<vec> EMultipole::ParseCubeFileHeader(string filename) {
1100 
1101  vector< vec > cube;
1102  cube.resize(5);
1103 
1104  // STRUCTURE CUBE CONTAINER
1105  // 0 1 2 3 4
1106  // | | | | | |
1107  // ox oy oz Nx Ny Nz xx xy xz yx yy yz zx zy zz
1108 
1109  std::string line;
1110  int lineCount = 0;
1111 
1112  double Nx = 0;
1113  double Ny = 0;
1114  double Nz = 0;
1115  double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
1116  double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
1117  double ext2nm = BOHR2NM;
1118 
1119  std::ifstream intt;
1120  intt.open(filename.c_str());
1121 
1122  if (intt.is_open()) {
1123  while (intt.good()) {
1124 
1125  ++lineCount;
1126 
1127  std::getline(intt, line);
1128  vector<string> split;
1129  Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
1130  toker.ToVector(split);
1131 
1132  // First two lines are comment lines
1133  if (lineCount == 1 || lineCount == 2) { continue; }
1134 
1135 
1136 
1137  // Skip empty lines
1138  if ( split.size() == 0) { continue; }
1139 
1140  // => Interesting information here
1141  if (lineCount == 3) {
1142 
1143  assert( split.size() == 4 );
1144  double ox = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
1145  double oy = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
1146  double oz = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
1147 
1148  cube[0] = vec(ox, oy, oz);
1149  }
1150 
1151  /*
1152  STRUCTURE SAMPLE CPMD CUBE FILE
1153  OUTER LOOP: X, MIDDLE LOOP: Y, INNER LOOP: Z
1154  3 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000
1155  40 0.283459 0.000000 0.000000
1156  40 0.000000 0.283459 0.000000
1157  40 0.000000 0.000000 0.283459
1158  8 0.000000 5.570575 5.669178 5.593517
1159  1 0.000000 5.562867 5.669178 7.428055
1160  1 0.000000 7.340606 5.669178 5.111259
1161  : : : : : :
1162  : : : : : :
1163  : : : : : :
1164  In this case there will be 40 x 40 x 40 floating point values
1165  : : : : : :
1166  : : : : : :
1167  : : : : : :
1168  */
1169 
1170  if (lineCount == 4) {
1171 
1172  assert( split.size() == 4 );
1173  Nx = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
1174  ext2nm = (Nx > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
1175  Nx = (Nx >= 0) ? Nx : -Nx;
1176  double xx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
1177  double xy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
1178  double xz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
1179 
1180  cube[2] = vec(xx, xy, xz);
1181  }
1182 
1183  if (lineCount == 5) {
1184 
1185  assert( split.size() == 4 );
1186  Ny = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
1187  ext2nm = (Ny > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
1188  Ny = (Ny >= 0) ? Ny : -Ny;
1189  double yx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
1190  double yy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
1191  double yz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
1192 
1193  cube[3] = vec(yx, yy, yz);
1194  }
1195 
1196  if (lineCount == 6) {
1197 
1198  assert( split.size() == 4 );
1199  Nz = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
1200  ext2nm = (Nz > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
1201  Nz = (Nz >= 0) ? Nz : -Nz;
1202  double zx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
1203  double zy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
1204  double zz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
1205 
1206  cube[4] = vec(zx, zy, zz);
1207  cube[1] = vec(Nx, Ny, Nz);
1208  }
1209 
1210  // Header at finish?
1211  if (lineCount > 6) {
1212  break;
1213  }
1214  }
1215  }
1216  else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
1217 
1218  // Convert origin
1219  cube[0] *= ext2nm;
1220 
1221  return cube;
1222 }

1229 void EMultipole::CalculateGSPInput(Topology *top) {
1230 
1231  cout << endl << "... ... Multipole analysis for input structures." << flush;
1232 
1233  map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
1234  for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
1235  sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
1236  ++sit) {
1237 
1238  vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
1239  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
1240 
1241  // Translate CoM to origin
1242  vec CoM = vec(0.,0.,0.);
1243  int N = poles.size();
1244  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1245  CoM += (*pit)->getPos();
1246  }
1247  CoM /= N;
1248  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1249  vec newpos = (*pit)->getPos() - CoM;
1250  (*pit)->setPos( newpos );
1251  }
1252 
1253  for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
1254 
1255  // Multipole data for this state?
1256  bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
1257  if (!hasState) { continue; }
1258 
1259  // Charge container appropriately
1260  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1261  (*pit)->Depolarize();
1262  (*pit)->Charge(state);
1263  }
1264 
1265  double ENM_TO_DEBYE = 10. / 0.20822678;
1266  //double ENM_TO_EA = 10.;
1267  double NM_TO_A = 10.;
1268  double D_INT_TO_EXT = ENM_TO_DEBYE;
1269  double Q_INT_TO_EXT = ENM_TO_DEBYE*NM_TO_A;
1270 
1271  FILE *out;
1272  string filename = "dma_" + sit->first
1273  + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
1274  + ".dat";
1275 
1276  out = fopen(filename.c_str(),"w");
1277 
1278  fprintf(out, "# Q00 \n"
1279  "# DX DY DZ \n"
1280  "# QXX QXY QXZ QYY QYZ QZZ \n");
1281 
1282  double q = 0.0;
1283  //double dx = 0.0; double dy = 0.0; double dz = 0.0;
1284  double Qxx = 0.0; double Qxy = 0.0; double Qxz = 0.0;
1285  double Qyy = 0.0; double Qyz = 0.0;
1286  double Qzz = 0.0;
1287 
1288  vec d = vec(0,0,0);
1289 
1290  for (pit = poles.begin();
1291  pit < poles.end();
1292  ++pit) {
1293 
1294  q += (*pit)->Q00;
1295 
1296  d += (*pit)->Q00 * (*pit)->getPos();
1297 
1298  Qxx += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getX()*(*pit)->getPos().getX()
1299  -0.5*(*pit)->getPos()*(*pit)->getPos() );
1300  Qyy += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getY()*(*pit)->getPos().getY()
1301  -0.5*(*pit)->getPos()*(*pit)->getPos() );
1302  Qzz += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getZ()*(*pit)->getPos().getZ()
1303  -0.5*(*pit)->getPos()*(*pit)->getPos() );
1304  Qxy += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getX()*(*pit)->getPos().getY() );
1305  Qxz += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getX()*(*pit)->getPos().getZ() );
1306  Qyz += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getY()*(*pit)->getPos().getZ() );
1307 
1308  if ((*pit)->getRank() > 0) {
1309  d += vec((*pit)->Q1x,(*pit)->Q1y,(*pit)->Q1z);
1310  }
1311  }
1312 
1313  fprintf(out, "%+4.7f \n"
1314  "%+4.7f %+4.7f %+4.7f \n"
1315  "%+4.7f %+4.7f %+4.7f %+4.7f %+4.7f %+4.7f \n",
1316  q,
1317  d.getX()*D_INT_TO_EXT,d.getY()*D_INT_TO_EXT,d.getZ()*D_INT_TO_EXT,
1318  Qxx*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qxy*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qxz*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qyy*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qyz*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qzz*Q_INT_TO_EXT);
1319  fclose(out);
1320  }
1321  }
1322 }

1329 void EMultipole::CalculateESPInput(Topology *top) {
1330 
1331  cout << endl << "... ... Calculating ESP";
1332 
1333  // Load grid from cube file
1334  _cube = ParseCubeFileHeader(_espCubeFile);
1335 
1336  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1337  // Iterate over segment types (in GDMA config) //
1338  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1339 
1340  map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
1341  for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
1342  sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
1343  ++sit) {
1344 
1345  cout << endl << "... ... ... ESP for segment type " << sit->first
1346  << flush;
1347 
1348  vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
1349  vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
1350 
1351  // Translate CoM to origin
1352  vec CoM = vec(0.,0.,0.);
1353  int N = poles.size();
1354  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1355  CoM += (*pit)->getPos();
1356  }
1357  CoM /= N;
1358  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1359  vec newpos = (*pit)->getPos() - CoM;
1360  (*pit)->setPos( newpos );
1361  }
1362 
1363  for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
1364 
1365  // Multipole data for this state?
1366  bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
1367  if (!hasState) { continue; }
1368 
1369  // Charge container appropriately
1370  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1371  (*pit)->Depolarize();
1372  (*pit)->Charge(state);
1373  }
1374 
1375  if (state == 0) {
1376  FILE *out;
1377  string chkOutfile = sit->first
1378  + "_input"
1379  + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
1380  + ".xyz";
1381  out = fopen(chkOutfile.c_str(),"w");
1382  fprintf(out, "%1lu\n\n", poles.size()*9);
1383  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1384  vec shift = vec(0,0,0);
1385  (*pit)->WriteChkLine(out, shift, true,"xyz", 0.04);
1386  }
1387  fclose(out);
1388  }
1389 
1390  // Prepare cube file, for structure sample see cube-file parser
1391  FILE *out;
1392  string espOutFile = sit->first
1393  + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
1394  + "_" + _espOutFile;
1395  out = fopen(espOutFile.c_str(), "w");
1396 
1397  fprintf(out, "CUBE FILE GENERATED BY VOTCA CTP \n");
1398  fprintf(out, "ESP %4s CHARGE %1d \n", (sit->first).c_str(), state);
1399 
1400  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... State " << state << ": " << flush;
1401 
1402  this->CalculateESP(poles, out);
1403 
1404  fclose(out);
1405  }
1406  }
1407 }

1415 void EMultipole::CalculateESPRigid(Topology *top) {

1421 
1422  int segId;

1424

1471  + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
1472  + "_" + _espOutFile;
1473  out = fopen(espOutFile.c_str(), "w");
1474 
1475  fprintf(out, "CUBE FILE GENERATED BY VOTCA CTP \n");

1482

1487 
1493 void EMultipole::CalculateESP(vector< PolarSite* > &poles, FILE *out) {
1494 
1495  // Calculate potential for each voxel, write to output on the fly
1496  Interactor actor = Interactor(NULL, this);
1497  vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
1498 
1499  vec Cxyz = _cube[0];
1500 
1501  vec C0 = _cube[0];
1502  vec Cx = _cube[2];
1503  vec Cy = _cube[3];
1504  vec Cz = _cube[4];
1505 
1506  int Nx = int(_cube[1].getX() + 0.5);
1507  int Ny = int(_cube[1].getY() + 0.5);
1508  int Nz = int(_cube[1].getZ() + 0.5);
1509 
1510 
1511  // Prepare cube file: Header
1512  double NM2BOHR = 1 / 0.0529189379;
1513  fprintf(out, "%5ld %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
1514  poles.size(),
1515  Cxyz.getX()*NM2BOHR,
1516  Cxyz.getY()*NM2BOHR,
1517  Cxyz.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
1518  fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
1519  Nx,
1520  Cx.getX()*NM2BOHR,
1521  Cx.getY()*NM2BOHR,
1522  Cx.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
1523  fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
1524  Ny,
1525  Cy.getX()*NM2BOHR,
1526  Cy.getY()*NM2BOHR,
1527  Cy.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
1528  fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
1529  Nz,
1530  Cz.getX()*NM2BOHR,
1531  Cz.getY()*NM2BOHR,
1532  Cz.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
1533  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1534 
1535  string elem = (*pit)->_name;
1536  int Z = 0;
1537  if (elem == "C") { Z = 6; }
1538  else if (elem == "H") { Z = 1; }
1539  else if (elem == "N") { Z = 7; }
1540  else if (elem == "O") { Z = 8; }
1541  else if (elem == "S") { Z = 16; }
1542 
1543  fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
1544  Z,
1545  0.000,
1546  (*pit)->getPos().getX() * NM2BOHR,
1547  (*pit)->getPos().getY() * NM2BOHR,
1548  (*pit)->getPos().getZ() * NM2BOHR);
1549  }
1550 
1551  int phiCount = 0;
1552  double int2V = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
1553 
1554  for (int i = 0; i < Nx; ++i) {
1555  for (int j = 0; j < Ny; ++j) {
1556  for ( int k = 0; k < Nz; ++k) {
1557 
1558  Cxyz = C0 + i*Cx + j*Cy + k*Cz;
1559 
1560  double phi = 0.0;
1561  ++phiCount;
1562 
1563  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1564  phi += actor.PotentialPerm(Cxyz, *(*pit));
1565  }
1566 
1567  fprintf(out, " %1.7E", phi * int2V);
1568  if ( (phiCount % 6) == 0 ) {
1569  fprintf(out, " \n");
1570  phiCount = 0;
1571  }
1572  }
1573  }
1574  }
1575 
1576  cout << " Calculated potential at " << Nx*Ny*Nz
1577  << " grid points. " << flush;
1578 
1579  // Calculate self-energy of configuration (just out of interest)
1580  double E = 0.0;
1581  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
1582  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1583  for (pit2 = pit + 1; pit2 < poles.end(); ++pit2) {
1584  E += actor.EnergyInterESP(*(*pit), *(*pit2));
1585  }
1586  }
1587  double E2eV = 1.602176487e-19 * 1e9 * 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12);
1588  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... "
1589  << "Electrostatic self-energy of configuration: "
1590  << E*E2eV << " eV. ";
1591 
1592 }

1600 void EMultipole::CalculateESF(Topology *top) {
1601 
1602  cout << endl << "... ... Calculating ESF";
1603 
1604  //double int2N_C = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 * 1.000e-18;
1605 
1606  // +++++++++++++++++++ //
1607  // Load grid from file //
1608  // +++++++++++++++++++ //
1609 
1610  vector<vec> gridPoints;
1611  double CONVERT2NM = 1;
1612 
1613  std::string line;
1614  std::ifstream intt;
1615  intt.open(this->_esfGridFile.c_str());
1616 
1617  if (intt.is_open() ) {
1618 
1619  while ( intt.good() ) {
1620 
1621 
1622  std::getline(intt, line);
1623  vector<string> split;
1624  Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
1625  toker.ToVector(split);
1626 
1627  if ( !split.size() ||
1628  split[0] == "!" ||
1629  split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
1630 
1631  // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
1632  // Units bohr
1633 
1634  // -0.3853409355 0.0004894995 -0.0003833545
1635  // -0.0002321905 0.2401559510 0.6602334308
1636  // ! ...
1637 
1638  // Units used
1639  if ( split[0] == "Units") {
1640  string units = split[1];
1641 
1642  if (units == "bohr") { CONVERT2NM = 0.0529189379; }
1643  else if (units == "nm") { CONVERT2NM = 1.; }
1644  else if (units == "A") { CONVERT2NM = 0.1; }
1645  else {
1646  throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
1647  + _esfGridFile + " not supported.");
1648  }
1649  }
1650 
1651  else {
1652 
1653  double x = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
1654  double y = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
1655  double z = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
1656 
1657  gridPoints.push_back(vec(x,y,z));
1658  }
1659  }
1660  }
1661  else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << _esfGridFile << endl; }
1662 
1663  this->_esfGrid = gridPoints;
1664 
1665  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1666  // Iterate over segment types (in GDMA config) //
1667  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1668 
1669  map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
1670  for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
1671  sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
1672  ++sit) {
1673 
1674  cout << endl << "... ... ... ESF for segment " << sit->first << flush;
1675 
1676 
1677 
1678  vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
1679  vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
1680 
1681  for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
1682 
1683  // Multipole data for this state?
1684  bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
1685  if (!hasState) { continue; }
1686 
1687  // Store the field
1688  vector< vec > gridPointESF;
1689 
1690  // Charge container appropriately
1691  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1692  (*pit)->Charge(state);
1693  }
1694 
1695  // Calculate field for each grid point, store in gridPointESF
1696  Interactor actor = Interactor(top, this);
1697 
1698  vector< vec >::iterator grit;
1699  for (grit = _esfGrid.begin(); grit < _esfGrid.end(); ++grit) {
1700 
1701  vec F = vec(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
1702 
1703  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1704  F += actor.FieldPermESF((*grit), *(*pit));
1705  }
1706  gridPointESF.push_back(F);
1707  }
1708 
1709  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... State " << state << ": "
1710  << " Calculated field at " << gridPointESF.size()
1711  << " grid points. " << flush;
1712 
1713 
1714  // Write to file
1715  FILE *out;
1716  string esfOutFile = sit->first
1717  + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
1718  + "_" + _esfOutFile;
1719 
1720  out = fopen(esfOutFile.c_str(), "w");
1721 
1722  assert(_esfGrid.size() == gridPointESF.size());
1723  unsigned int g = 0;
1724  unsigned int p = 0;
1725  for ( ; p < gridPointESF.size(); ++g, ++p) {
1726 
1727  fprintf(out, " %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f \n",
1728  _esfGrid[g].getX(),
1729  _esfGrid[g].getY(),
1730  _esfGrid[g].getZ(),
1731  gridPointESF[p].getX(),
1732  gridPointESF[p].getY(),
1733  gridPointESF[p].getZ() );
1734  }
1735  }
1736  }
1737 }

1744 void EMultipole::CalculateAlphaInput(Topology *top) {
1745 
1746  cout << endl << "... ... Calculating site polarizabilities";
1747 
1748  map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
1749  for (sit = _map_seg_polarSites.begin();
1750  sit != _map_seg_polarSites.end();
1751  ++sit) {
1752 
1753  cout << endl << "... ... ... Polarizability for segment "
1754  << sit->first << flush;
1755 
1756  FILE *out;
1757  string alphaOutFile = sit->first + "_" + _alphaOutFile;
1758  out = fopen(alphaOutFile.c_str(), "w");
1759

1761 
1762  // Neutral state
1763  int state = 0;
1764  if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
1765 
1766  for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
1767  (*pit)->Charge(state);
1768  }
1769 
1770  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... NEUTRAL " << state;
1771  fprintf(out, "[ NEUTRAL ] \n");
1772  this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
1773  }
1774 
1775  // Cationic state
1776  state = +1;
1777  if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
1778 
1779  for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
1780  (*pit)->Charge(state);
1781  }
1782 
1783  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... CATION " << state;
1784  fprintf(out, "\n\n[ CATION ] \n");
1785  this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
1786  }
1787 
1788  // Anionic state
1789  state = -1;
1790  if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
1791 
1792  for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
1793  (*pit)->Charge(state);
1794  }
1795 
1796  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... ANION " << state;
1797  fprintf(out, "\n\n[ ANION ] \n");
1798  this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
1799  }
1800 
1801  // Not necessary, still: Charge back to neutral state
1802  for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
1803  (*pit)->Charge(0);
1804  }
1805 
1806  }
1807 }

1809 
1813 void EMultipole::CalculateAlphaRigid(vector< PolarSite* > &poles,
1814  FILE *out, bool system) {
1815 
1816  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
1817 
1818  double axx, axy, axz; // |
1819  double ayx, ayy, ayz; // |-> Polarizability tensor
1820  double azx, azy, azz; // |
1821 
1822  double siteU1x, siteU1y, siteU1z; // |-> Molecular ind. dipole
1823 
1824  double extFx, extFy, extFz; // |-> External applied field
1825 
1826  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1827  // External field in x-direction //
1828  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1829 
1830  siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
1831 
1832  extFx = 0.1;
1833  extFy = 0.0;
1834  extFz = 0.0;
1835 
1836  // Set permanent field
1837  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1838  (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
1839  (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
1840  (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
1841  }
1842 
1843  // Calculate induction field
1844  this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
1845 
1846  // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
1847  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1848  siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
1849  siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
1850  siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
1851  }
1852 
1853  // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
1854  axx = - siteU1x / extFx;
1855  ayx = - siteU1y / extFx;
1856  azx = - siteU1z / extFx;
1857 
1858  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1859  // External field in y-direction //
1860  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1861 
1862  siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
1863 
1864  extFx = 0.0;
1865  extFy = 0.1;
1866  extFz = 0.0;
1867 
1868  // Set permanent field
1869  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1870  (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
1871  (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
1872  (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
1873  }
1874 
1875  // Calculate induction field
1876  this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
1877 
1878  // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
1879  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1880  siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
1881  siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
1882  siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
1883  }
1884 
1885  // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
1886  axy = - siteU1x / extFy;
1887  ayy = - siteU1y / extFy;
1888  azy = - siteU1z / extFy;
1889 
1890  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1891  // External field in z-direction //
1892  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1893 
1894  siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
1895 
1896  extFx = 0.0;
1897  extFy = 0.0;
1898  extFz = 0.1;
1899 
1900  // Set permanent field
1901  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1902  (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
1903  (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
1904  (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
1905  }
1906 
1907  // Calculate induction field
1908  this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
1909 
1910  // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
1911  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1912  siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
1913  siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
1914  siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
1915  }
1916 
1917  // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
1918  axz = - siteU1x / extFz;
1919  ayz = - siteU1y / extFz;
1920  azz = - siteU1z / extFz;
1921 
1922  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1923  // Sum, Trace, Diagonalization //
1924  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1925 
1926  // Sum over atomic polarizabilities
1927  double SUM_alpha = 0.0;
1928  for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
1929  SUM_alpha += (*pit)->P1;
1930  }
1931 
1932  double NM3_2_A3 = 1000.;
1933  SUM_alpha *= NM3_2_A3;
1934 
1935  // TODO Diagonalize polarizability tensor
1936  // For now, trace is enough
1937  double ISO_alpha = (axx + ayy + azz) / 3.;
1938 
1939  ISO_alpha *= NM3_2_A3;
1940 
1941  // Eigenvalues of polarizability tensor
1942  matrix alpha = matrix( vec(axx,ayx,azx),
1943  vec(axy,ayy,azy),
1944  vec(axz,ayz,azz) );
1945  matrix::eigensystem_t EIGEN;
1946  alpha.SolveEigensystem(EIGEN);
1947 
1948 
1949  if (! system) {
1950  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... Sum over atomic alphas: "
1951  << SUM_alpha << " A**3.";
1952  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... 1/3 trace of alpha tensor: "
1953  << ISO_alpha << " A**3.";
1954  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... Eigenvalues: "
1955  << EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3, "
1956  << EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3, "
1957  << EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3. ";
1958  }
1959 
1960  if (_alphaOutFile != "noname" && _alphaOutFile != "") {
1961 
1962  vec x = EIGEN.eigenvecs[0];
1963  vec y = EIGEN.eigenvecs[1];
1964  vec z = EIGEN.eigenvecs[2];
1965 
1966  if (! system) {
1967  fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor in global frame \n");
1968  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", axx*NM3_2_A3, axy*NM3_2_A3, axz*NM3_2_A3);
1969  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", ayx*NM3_2_A3, ayy*NM3_2_A3, ayz*NM3_2_A3);
1970  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", azx*NM3_2_A3, azy*NM3_2_A3, azz*NM3_2_A3);
1971  fprintf(out, "\n");
1972  fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor in eigenframe \n");
1973  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3,0.,0.);
1974  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", 0.,EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3,0.);
1975  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", 0.,0.,EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3);
1976  fprintf(out, "\n");
1977  fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor main axes \n");
1978  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", x.getX(),x.getY(),x.getZ());
1979  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", y.getX(),y.getY(),y.getZ());
1980  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", z.getX(),z.getY(),z.getZ());
1981  }
1982  else {
1983  fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f ",
1984  ISO_alpha, SUM_alpha,
1985  EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3,
1986  EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3,
1987  EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3);
1988  }
1989  }
1990 }
1991 
1992 
1997 void EMultipole::SiteAlphaInduce(Topology *top, vector<PolarSite*> &poles) {
1998 
1999  int maxIter = this->_maxIter;
2000  double wSOR = this->_wSOR_N;
2001  double eTOL = this->_epsTol;
2002 
2003  vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit1;
2004  vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit2;
2005 
2006  Interactor actor = Interactor(top, this);
2007 
2008  // Induce to first order
2009  for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
2010  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
2011  }
2012 
2013 
2014  int iter = 0;
2015  for ( ; iter < maxIter; ++iter) {
2016 
2017  // Reset induction field
2018  for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
2019  (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
2020  }
2021 
2022  // Calculate higher-order induction field
2023  for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
2024  for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < poles.end(); ++pit2) {
2025  actor.FieldInduAlpha(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
2026  }
2027  }
2028 
2029  // Induce dipoles
2030  for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
2031  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
2032  }
2033 
2034  // Check for convergence
2035  bool converged = true;
2036  double maxdU = -1;
2037  double avgdU = 0.0;
2038  int baseN = 0;
2039 
2040  for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
2041  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
2042  avgdU += dU;
2043  ++baseN;
2044  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
2045  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
2046  }
2047 
2048  avgdU /= baseN;
2049  if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
2050 
2051  //cout << endl << "ITER" << iter << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
2052  // << " | AVG dU " << avgdU;
2053 
2054  // Break if converged
2055  if (converged) { break; }
2056  else if (iter == maxIter - 1) {
2057  cout << endl << "... ... ... "
2058  << "WARNING Induced multipoles did not converge to precision: "
2059  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
2060  break;
2061  }
2062  }
2063 }

2072 void EMultipole::DistributeMpoles(Topology *top) {
2073 
2074  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2075  // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
2076  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2077 
2078  vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
2079  for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
2080  sit < top->Segments().end();
2081  ++sit) {
2082 
2083  Segment *seg = *sit;
2084  vector<PolarSite*> poleSites = _map_seg_polarSites.at(seg->getName());
2085  seg->setChrgStates(_map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()]);
2086 
2087  bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
2088 
2089  vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
2090  for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
2091  fit < seg->Fragments().end();
2092  ++fit) {
2093 
2094  Fragment *frag = *fit;
2095 
2096  string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
2097  + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
2098  vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
2099  vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
2100 
2101  if (map2md) {
2102  if (polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
2103  cout << endl << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName() <<
2104  " Fragment " << frag->getName() <<
2105  ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar sites "
2106  " as there are atoms to perform mapping. " << endl;
2107  throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
2108  }
2109  }
2110 
2111 
2112  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
2113 
2114  string name = namesInFrag[i];
2115  int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
2116 
2117  PolarSite *templ = poleSites[poleId-1];
2118  PolarSite *newSite = top->AddPolarSite(name);
2119  newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
2120  seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
2121  frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
2122 
2123  // Shift + rotate
2124  if (!map2md) {
2125  newSite->Translate(frag->getTransQM2MD());
2126  newSite->Rotate(frag->getRotQM2MD(), frag->getCoMD());
2127  }
2128  else {
2129  vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
2130  newSite->setPos(mdpos);
2131  if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
2132  cout << endl << "ERROR: MAP2MD = TRUE "
2133  " prevents use of higher-rank multipoles. " << endl;
2134  throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
2135  }
2136  }
2137  }
2138  }
2139  }
2140 
2141  top->setIsEStatified(true);
2142 
2143 }

2152 bool EMultipole::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
2153 
2154  // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
2155  // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
2156  // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
2157 
2158  // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
2159  if (!top->isRigid()) {
2160  bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
2161  if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
2162  }
2163  else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
2164 
2165  // Forward multipoles to topology
2166  if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
2167  this->DistributeMpoles(top);
2168  cout << endl << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
2169  << " multipole sites." << flush;
2170  }
2171  else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already estatified."; }
2172 
2173  if (_checkPolesPDB != "") {
2174  cout << endl << "... ... Writing polar-site coordinates to "
2175  << _checkPolesPDB << ". " << flush;
2176  // To check rotation into global frame
2177  string mpNAME = _checkPolesPDB;
2178  FILE *mpPDB = NULL;
2179  mpPDB = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
2180  vector<Segment*>::iterator sit;
2181  for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
2182  sit < top->Segments().end();
2183  ++sit) {
2184  (*sit)->WritePDB(mpPDB, "Multipoles", "MD");
2185  }

2282 
2283  if (this->_calcGSP) {

2332  -0.5*(*pit)->getPos()*(*pit)->getPos() );
2333  Qyy += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getY()*(*pit)->getPos().getY()
2334  -0.5*(*pit)->getPos()*(*pit)->getPos() );
2335  Qzz += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getZ()*(*pit)->getPos().getZ()
2336  -0.5*(*pit)->getPos()*(*pit)->getPos() );
2337  Qxy += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getX()*(*pit)->getPos().getY() );
2338  Qxz += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getX()*(*pit)->getPos().getZ() );
2339  Qyz += (*pit)->Q00 * ( 1.5*(*pit)->getPos().getY()*(*pit)->getPos().getZ() );
2340

2342  d += vec((*pit)->Q1x,(*pit)->Q1y,(*pit)->Q1z);
2343  }

2346  (*pit)->Translate(+1*seg->getPos());
2347  }

2356  prj_r,

2359  Qxx*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qxy*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qxz*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qyy*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qyz*Q_INT_TO_EXT,Qzz*Q_INT_TO_EXT);

2381  for (pit = seg1->PolarSites().begin();
2382  pit < seg1->PolarSites().end();
2383  ++pit) {

2387

2391  }
2392  // Undo shift
2393  (*pit)->Translate(+1*seg1->getPos());
2394  }
2395 
2396 
2397 
2398  for (sit2 = sit + 1;
2399  sit2 < top->Segments().end();
2400  ++sit2) {
2401 
2402  Segment *seg2 = *sit2;
2403  if (seg2->getId() > id2) continue;
2404

2406

2408  vec d2 = vec(0,0,0);

2410  pit2 < seg2->PolarSites().end();
2411  ++pit2) {

2519  }

2522  }
2523

2525  fprintf(out, " +1 %3.8f ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(+1) );
2526  }
2527

2552  }
2553  }
2554

2557 }

2564 
2569 Segment *EMultipole::RequestNextSite(int opId, Topology *top) {
2570 
2571  _nextSiteMutex.Lock();
2572 
2573  Segment *workOnThis;
2574 
2575  if (_nextSite == top->Segments().end()) {
2576  workOnThis = NULL;
2577  }
2578  else if ((*_nextSite)->getId() > _lastSeg && _lastSeg > 0) {
2579  workOnThis = NULL;
2580  }
2581  else {
2582  workOnThis = *_nextSite;
2583  _nextSite++;
2584  cout << endl << "... ... OP " << opId
2585  << " evaluating energy for site "
2586  << workOnThis->getId() << flush;
2587  }
2588 
2589  _nextSiteMutex.Unlock();
2590 
2591  return workOnThis;
2592 }

2599 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Run(void) {
2600 
2601  while (true) {
2602

2604

2606  else { this->EvalSite(_top, _seg); }
2607  }

2615 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
2616 
2617 
2618  vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
2619  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
2620  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
2621  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
2622 
2623  _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
2624  assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
2625 
2626  for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
2627  sitRef < top->Segments().end();
2628  ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
2629 
2630  (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
2631 
2632  for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
2633  pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
2634  pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
2635  ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
2636 
2637  *pitNew = new PolarSite();
2638  (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
2639  (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
2640  }
2641  }
2642 }

2669 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg) {

2943 int EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Induce(int state) {
2944 
2945  double wSOR = (state == 0) ? _master->_wSOR_N : _master->_wSOR_C;
2946  double eTOL = this->_master->_epsTol;
2947  int maxI = this->_master->_maxIter;
2948 
2949  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
2950  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
2951  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
2952  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
2953 
2954  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2955  // Inter-site fields (arising from perm. m'poles) //
2956  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2957 
2958 // cout << endl << "... ... ... 0th-order field" << flush;
2959  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2960  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2961  ++sit1) {
2962  for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
2963  sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2964  ++sit2) {
2965 
2966  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2967  for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
2968 
2969  _actor.FieldPerm(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2970  }}
2971  }}
2972 
2973  // +++++++++++++++++++ //
2974  // 1st-order induction //
2975  // +++++++++++++++++++ //
2976 
2977 // cout << " | Induce " << endl;
2978  if (state == 0 || maxI <= 0) { // OVERRIDE
2979  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2980  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2981  ++sit1) {
2982 
2983  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2984  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
2985  }
2986  }
2987  }
2988 
2989  if (maxI < 0) { maxI = - maxI; }
2990 
2991  // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2992  // Higher-order induction //
2993  // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2994 
2995  int iter = 0;
2996 // boost::progress_timer T;
2997  for ( ; iter < maxI; ++iter) {
2998 
2999  // Reset fields FUx, FUy, FUz
3000 // cout << "\r... ... ... Reset (" << iter << ")" << flush;
3001  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
3002  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
3003  ++sit1) {
3004 
3005  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
3006  (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
3007  }
3008  }
3009 
3010  // Intra-site contribution to induction field
3011 // cout << " | Intra-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
3012  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
3013  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
3014  ++sit1) {
3015 
3016  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
3017  for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
3018 
3019  _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
3020  }}
3021  }
3022 
3023  // Inter-site contribution to induction field
3024 // cout << " | Inter-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
3025  //boost::progress_display show_progress( _polsPolSphere.size() );
3026 // T.restart();
3027  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
3028  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
3029  ++sit1) {
3030  for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
3031  sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
3032  ++sit2) {
3033 
3034  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
3035  for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
3036 
3037  _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
3038  }}
3039  }}
3040 // cout << " | dt " << T.elapsed() << flush;
3041 
3042  // Induce again
3043 // cout << " | Induce (" << iter << ")" << flush;
3044  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
3045  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
3046  ++sit1) {
3047 
3048  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
3049  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
3050  }
3051  }
3052 
3053  // Check for convergence
3054 // cout << " | Check (" << iter << ")" << flush;
3055  bool converged = true;
3056  double maxdU = -1;
3057  double avgdU = 0.0;
3058  int baseN = 0;
3059  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
3060  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
3061  ++sit1) {
3062 
3063  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
3064  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
3065  avgdU += dU;
3066  ++baseN;
3067  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
3068  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
3069  }
3070  }
3071  avgdU /= baseN;
3072  if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
3073 
3074 // cout << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
3075 // << " | AVG dU " << avgdU
3076 // << " | SOR " << wSOR << flush;
3077 
3078  // Break if converged
3079  if (converged) {
3080  break;
3081  }
3082  else if (iter == maxI - 1) {
3083  this->_master->LockCout();
3084  cout << endl << "... ... ... WARNING Induced multipoles for site "
3085  << _seg->getId() << " - state " << state
3086  << " did not converge to precision: "
3087  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
3088  this->_master->UnlockCout();
3089  break;
3090  }
3091  }
3092 
3093  return iter;
3094 
3095 // cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state
3096 // << " - wSOR " << wSOR
3097 // << " - Iterations " << iter << flush;
3098 }

3265 
3269 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::PotentialPerm(vec r,
3270  PolarSite &pol) {
3271 
3272  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3273  e12 = pol.getPos() - r;
3274  R = 1/abs(e12);
3275  R2 = R*R;
3276  R3 = R2*R;
3277  R4 = R3*R;
3278  R5 = R4*R;
3279  e12 *= R;
3280 
3281 
3282 
3283 
3284  rbx = - e12.getX();
3285  rby = - e12.getY();
3286  rbz = - e12.getZ();
3287 
3288  double phi00 = 0.0;
3289 
3290  phi00 += T00_00() * pol.Q00;
3291 
3292  if (pol._rank > 0) {
3293  phi00 += T00_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3294  phi00 += T00_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3295  phi00 += T00_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3296  }
3297 
3298  if (pol._rank > 1) {
3299  phi00 += T00_20() * pol.Q20;
3300  phi00 += T00_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3301  phi00 += T00_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3302  phi00 += T00_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3303  phi00 += T00_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3304  }
3305 
3306  return phi00;
3307 }

3312 inline vec EMultipole::Interactor::FieldPermESF(vec r,
3313  PolarSite &pol) {
3314  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3315  e12 = pol.getPos() - r;
3316  R = 1/abs(e12);
3317  R2 = R*R;
3318  R3 = R2*R;
3319  R4 = R3*R;
3320  R5 = R4*R;
3321  e12 *= R;
3322 
3323  rax = e12.getX();
3324  ray = e12.getY();
3325  raz = e12.getZ();
3326  rbx = - rax;
3327  rby = - ray;
3328  rbz = - raz;
3329 
3330  cxx = 1;
3331  cxy = 0;
3332  cxz = 0;
3333  cyx = 0;
3334  cyy = 1;
3335  cyz = 0;
3336  czx = 0;
3337  czy = 0;
3338  czz = 1;
3339 
3340  double Fx = 0.0;
3341  double Fy = 0.0;
3342  double Fz = 0.0;
3343 
3344  // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
3345  Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
3346  Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
3347  Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
3348 
3349  // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
3350  if (pol._rank > 0) {
3351  Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3352  Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3353  Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3354 
3355  Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3356  Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3357  Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3358 
3359  Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3360  Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3361  Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3362  }
3363 
3364  // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
3365  if (pol._rank > 1) {
3366  Fx += T1x_20() * pol.Q20;
3367  Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3368  Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3369  Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3370  Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3371 
3372  Fy += T1y_20() * pol.Q20;
3373  Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3374  Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3375  Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3376  Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3377 
3378  Fz += T1z_20() * pol.Q20;
3379  Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3380  Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3381  Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3382  Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3383  }
3384 
3385  return vec(Fx, Fy, Fz);
3386 }
3387 
3391 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1,
3392  PolarSite &pol2) {
3393  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3394  e12 = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
3395  R = 1/abs(e12);
3396  R2 = R*R;
3397  R3 = R2*R;
3398  R4 = R3*R;
3399  R5 = R4*R;
3400  e12 *= R;
3401 
3402  // Thole damping init.
3403  a = _em->_aDamp;
3404  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3405 
3406 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3407 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3408 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3409 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3410 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3411 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3412 
3413  rax = e12.getX();
3414  ray = e12.getY();
3415  raz = e12.getZ();
3416  rbx = - rax;
3417  rby = - ray;
3418  rbz = - raz;
3419 
3420 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3421 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3422 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3423 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3424 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3425 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3426 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3427 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3428 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3429 
3430  cxx = 1;
3431  cxy = 0;
3432  cxz = 0;
3433  cyx = 0;
3434  cyy = 1;
3435  cyz = 0;
3436  czx = 0;
3437  czy = 0;
3438  czz = 1;
3439 
3440  // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
3441 
3442  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3443  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3444  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3445  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3446  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3447  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3448  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3449  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3450  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3451  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3452 
3453  pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
3454  pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
3455  pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
3456  pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;

3458  pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
3459  pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
3460  pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
3461  pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;

3472  pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;

3485 
3489 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1,
3490  PolarSite &pol2) {
3491 
3492  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3493  // This implies that induced = - alpha * field
3494  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3495  R = 1/abs(e12);
3496  R2 = R*R;
3497  R3 = R2*R;
3498  R4 = R3*R;
3499  R5 = R4*R;
3500  e12 *= R;
3501 
3502  // Thole damping init.
3503  a = _em->_aDamp;
3504  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3505 
3506 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3507 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3508 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3509 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3510 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3511 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3512 
3513  rax = e12.getX();
3514  ray = e12.getY();
3515  raz = e12.getZ();
3516  rbx = - rax;
3517  rby = - ray;
3518  rbz = - raz;
3519 
3520 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3521 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3522 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3523 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3524 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3525 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3526 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3527 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3528 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3529 
3530  cxx = 1;
3531  cxy = 0;
3532  cxz = 0;
3533  cyx = 0;
3534  cyy = 1;
3535  cyz = 0;
3536  czx = 0;
3537  czy = 0;
3538  czz = 1;
3539 
3540  // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
3541 
3542  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3543  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3544  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3545  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3546  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3547  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3548  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3549  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3550  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3551  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3552 
3553  pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
3554  pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
3555  pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
3556  pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
3557  pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
3558  pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
3559  pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
3560  pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
3561  pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
3562  }
3563  else {
3564  pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3565  pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3566  pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3567  pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3568  pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3569  pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3570  pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3571  pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3572  pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3573 
3574  pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
3575  pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
3576  pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
3577  pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
3578  pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
3579  pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
3580  pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
3581  pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
3582  pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
3583  }
3584 }

3589 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1,
3590  PolarSite &pol2) {
3591 
3592  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3593  // This implies that induced = - alpha * field
3594  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3595  R = 1/abs(e12);
3596  R2 = R*R;
3597  R3 = R2*R;
3598  R4 = R3*R;
3599  R5 = R4*R;
3600  e12 *= R;
3601 
3602 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3603 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3604 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3605 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3606 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3607 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3608 
3609  rax = e12.getX();
3610  ray = e12.getY();
3611  raz = e12.getZ();
3612  rbx = - rax;
3613  rby = - ray;
3614  rbz = - raz;
3615 
3616  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
3617 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3618 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3619 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3620 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3621 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3622 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3623 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3624 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3625 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3626 
3627  cxx = 1;
3628  cxy = 0;
3629  cxz = 0;
3630  cyx = 0;
3631  cyy = 1;
3632  cyz = 0;
3633  czx = 0;
3634  czy = 0;
3635  czz = 1;
3636  }
3637 
3638  // Fields generated by rank-0 m'poles
3639  pol1.FPx += T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
3640  pol1.FPy += T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
3641  pol1.FPz += T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
3642 
3643  pol2.FPx += T00_1x() * pol1.Q00;
3644  pol2.FPy += T00_1y() * pol1.Q00;
3645  pol2.FPz += T00_1z() * pol1.Q00;
3646 
3647  // Fields generated by rank-1 m'poles
3648  if (pol2._rank > 0) {
3649  pol1.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3650  pol1.FPx += T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
3651  pol1.FPx += T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3652  pol1.FPy += T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3653  pol1.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
3654  pol1.FPy += T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3655  pol1.FPz += T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3656  pol1.FPz += T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
3657  pol1.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3658  }
3659  if (pol1._rank > 0) {
3660  pol2.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol1.Q1x;
3661  pol2.FPx += T1y_1x() * pol1.Q1y;
3662  pol2.FPx += T1z_1x() * pol1.Q1z;
3663  pol2.FPy += T1x_1y() * pol1.Q1x;
3664  pol2.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol1.Q1y;
3665  pol2.FPy += T1z_1y() * pol1.Q1z;
3666  pol2.FPz += T1x_1z() * pol1.Q1x;
3667  pol2.FPz += T1y_1z() * pol1.Q1y;
3668  pol2.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol1.Q1z;
3669  }
3670 
3671  // Fields generated by rank-2 m'poles
3672  if (pol2._rank > 1) {
3673  pol1.FPx += T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
3674  pol1.FPx += T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3675  pol1.FPx += T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3676  pol1.FPx += T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3677  pol1.FPx += T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3678 
3679  pol1.FPy += T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
3680  pol1.FPy += T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3681  pol1.FPy += T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3682  pol1.FPy += T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3683  pol1.FPy += T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3684 
3685  pol1.FPz += T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
3686  pol1.FPz += T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3687  pol1.FPz += T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3688  pol1.FPz += T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3689  pol1.FPz += T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3690  }
3691  if (pol1._rank > 1) {
3692  pol2.FPx += T20_1x() * pol1.Q20;
3693  pol2.FPx += T21c_1x() * pol1.Q21c;
3694  pol2.FPx += T21s_1x() * pol1.Q21s;
3695  pol2.FPx += T22c_1x() * pol1.Q22c;
3696  pol2.FPx += T22s_1x() * pol1.Q22s;
3697 
3698  pol2.FPy += T20_1y() * pol1.Q20;
3699  pol2.FPy += T21c_1y() * pol1.Q21c;
3700  pol2.FPy += T21s_1y() * pol1.Q21s;
3701  pol2.FPy += T22c_1y() * pol1.Q22c;
3702  pol2.FPy += T22s_1y() * pol1.Q22s;
3703 
3704  pol2.FPz += T20_1z() * pol1.Q20;
3705  pol2.FPz += T21c_1z() * pol1.Q21c;
3706  pol2.FPz += T21s_1z() * pol1.Q21s;
3707  pol2.FPz += T22c_1z() * pol1.Q22c;
3708  pol2.FPz += T22s_1z() * pol1.Q22s;
3709  }

3715 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1,
3716  PolarSite &pol2) {
3717 
3718  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3719  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3720  R = 1/abs(e12);
3721  R2 = R*R;
3722  R3 = R2*R;
3723  R4 = R3*R;
3724  R5 = R4*R;
3725  e12 *= R;
3726 
3727  // Thole damping init.
3728  a = _em->_aDamp;
3729  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3730 
3731 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3732 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3733 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3734 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3735 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3736 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3737 
3738  rax = e12.getX();
3739  ray = e12.getY();
3740  raz = e12.getZ();
3741  rbx = - rax;
3742  rby = - ray;
3743  rbz = - raz;
3744 
3745  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
3746 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3747 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3748 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3749 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3750 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3751 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3752 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3753 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3754 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3755 
3756  cxx = 1;
3757  cxy = 0;
3758  cxz = 0;
3759  cyx = 0;
3760  cyy = 1;
3761  cyz = 0;
3762  czx = 0;
3763  czy = 0;
3764  czz = 1;
3765  }
3766 
3767  double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
3768 
3769  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3770  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
3771  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
3772  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
3773 
3774  U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3775  U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3776  U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3777  }
3778  else {
3779  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
3780  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
3781  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
3782 
3783  U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3784  U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3785  U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3786  }
3787 
3788  if (pol1._rank > 0) {
3789  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3790  U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3791  U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3792  U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3793  U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3794  U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3795  U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3796  U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3797  U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3798  U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3799  }
3800  else {

3802  U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;

3827  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3828  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;

3831  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3832  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;

3849  U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3850  U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;

3873  if (pol2._rank > 1) {
3874  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3875  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
3876  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3877  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3878  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3879  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3880  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
3881  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3882  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3883  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3884  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3885  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
3886  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3887  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3888  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3889  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3890  }
3891  else {
3892  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
3893  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3894  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3895  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3896  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3897  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
3898  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3899  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3900  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3901  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3902  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
3903  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3904  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3905  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3906  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3907  }
3908  }
3909 
3910  // Take into account work needed to induce multipoles
3911  U *= 0.5;
3912 
3913  EU_INTRA += U;
3914  return U;
3915 }
3916 
3920 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1,
3921  PolarSite &pol2) {
3922 
3923  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3924  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3925  R = 1/abs(e12);
3926  R2 = R*R;
3927  R3 = R2*R;
3928  R4 = R3*R;
3929  R5 = R4*R;
3930  e12 *= R;
3931 
3932  // Thole damping init.
3933  a = _em->_aDamp;
3934  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3935 
3936 
3937  //cout << "frag1 " << pol1.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
3938  //cout << "frag2 " << pol2.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
3939  //cout << "seg1 " << pol1.getSegment()->getId() << endl;
3940  //cout << "seg2 " << pol2.getSegment()->getId() << endl;
3941 
3942 
3943 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3944 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3945 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3946 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3947 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3948 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3949 
3950  rax = e12.getX();
3951  ray = e12.getY();
3952  raz = e12.getZ();
3953  rbx = - rax;
3954  rby = - ray;
3955  rbz = - raz;

3957  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {

3959 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;

3961 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3962 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3963 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;

3965 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3966 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3967

3969  cxy = 0;
3970  cxz = 0;
3971  cyx = 0;
3972  cyy = 1;
3973  cyz = 0;

3975  czy = 0;

4251  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
4252  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
4253  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
4254  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
4255 
4256 
4257  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4258  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4259  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4260  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4261  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4262  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4263 
4264 
4265  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4266  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4267  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4268  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4269 
4270  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4271  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4272  }
4273  //cout << "E up to Q <-> Q " << E << endl;
4274 
4275 
4276  // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
4277  U *= 0.5;
4278 
4279  EP += E;
4280  EU_INTER += U;
4281  return E + U;
4282 }

4287 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1,

4290  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
4291  e12 = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
4292  R = 1/abs(e12);
4293  R2 = R*R;
4294  R3 = R2*R;
4295  R4 = R3*R;
4296  R5 = R4*R;
4297  e12 *= R;
4298 
4299  // Thole damping init.
4300  a = _em->_aDamp;
4301  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
4302 
4303  rax = e12.getX();

4307  rby = - ray;

4310  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
